title: NFL Week 8 Predictions: Our Picks for Each Game
description: The 49ers and Rams battle to keep pace with in the N.F.C. West, while Geno Smith and the Seahawks put their winning streak up against that of Daniel Jones and the Giants.
dc:creator: David Hill
media:description: Christian McCaffrey had 158 yards from scrimmage on 20 touches against the Rams in his final game in Carolina before being traded to the 49ers. He will face Los Angeles again on Sunday.
